How to Use¶

Web Interface: - Text Input:

  1. Click the “Text Input” button.

  2. Enter your text and click “Submit.”

  • Voice Input: 1. Click the “Voice Input” button. 2. Start speaking, then click “Stop Recording.”

Result: - If suspicious activity is detected:

  • A warning message is displayed.

  • The audio file is saved.

API Usage Examples: - Text Analysis: Send a POST request with text data to the /process_text endpoint. - Voice Analysis: Upload an audio file to the /process_voice endpoint.

Viewing Warning Messages: - Explains how warnings are displayed in the user interface when detected.
